snippet: Talks between Israel and the Palestinian Authority in Jordan are taking place in a region in which political Islam is emerging as a potentially transformative force.
abstract: Talks between Israel and the Palestinian Authority in Jordan are taking place in a region in which political Islam is emerging as a potentially transformative force; it is first encounter between the parties in more than a year.

byline.contributor: Ranya Kadri contributed reporting from Amman, Jordan.

lead_paragraph: Talks between Israel and the Palestinian Authority in Jordan are taking place in a region in which political Islam is emerging as a potentially transformative force.

headline.seo: Rise of Political Islam Alters Israeli and Palestinian Talks
headline.main: As Israelis and Palestinians Talk, the Rise of a Political Islam Alters the Equation
headline.print_headline: As Israelis and Palestinians Talk, the Rise of a Political Islam Alters the Equation

keywords.value: Middle East and North Africa Unrest (2010- )
keywords.name: subject
